mapper.select: select c.clnt_cd, c.clnt_nm, o.order_dt, o.dlvry_dt, u.id,u.name,o.csmtr_ord_num from client c join order_mng o on c.clnt_id = o.clnt_id join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id order by c.clnt_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from item
where item_num like CONCAT('%', #{itemNum}, '%') and item_nm like CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%')

select count(*) from user
where id like CONCAT('%', #{userNum}, '%') and name like CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')

select count(*) from client
where clnt_cd like CONCAT('%', #{clntCd}, '%') and clnt_nm like CONCAT('%', #{clntName}, '%')
